abilities.description: When you implore the ancestral spirits to heal another person, roll +wits and add +1. On a strong hit, the patient mends or heartens (as in the @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.25421995c803340e]{Sojourn} move). On a weak hit, as above but the spirits ask something of you in return.

When you eat vision root and dream prophetic dreams, roll +wits and @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.e09e2fc8bb709320]{Endure Stress} (1 stress). On a strong hit, you see a future failure that you can now avoid. Once before the next dawn when you miss on a non-progress roll, you may improve it to a strong hit. On a weak hit, as above but improve the miss to a weak hit instead.

After you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.010e27aa4376d4df]{Swear an Iron Vow} to heal an ally of a bane or burden, one time only you may consult the ancestral spirits for guidance. If you do, roll +wits. On a hit, you conceive of a medicinal muti and the ingredients required. Take +2 momentum. On a strong hit, also reduce the rank of the vow one step.
